meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessive.
meanings.sent1: Her excessiveness in eating sweets led to cavities.
meanings.sent2: The excessiveness of his spending habits left him in debt.
meanings.sent3: The excessiveness of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: His excessiveness in collecting stamps knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The excessiveness of the decorations made the party unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The excessiveness of the noise made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: She was concerned about the excessiveness of her workload.
meanings.sent3: The excessiveness of his excitement was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The excessiveness of the heat made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent5: The excessiveness of the traffic delayed their arrival.
